changes.description: Accessibility testing in CI now includes auto-generating the sitemap pa11y-ci requires to run. Previously, the sitemap had to be generated manually after every update to the app's routes. Now, CI runs a new npm script for generating the sitemap and running pa11y-ci immediately.
Removed the `sitemap.xml` file from the app's public folder. That XML file was only used for accessibility testing, so it doesn't need to be part of the deployed app.
